players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Diana's death on night 1 means the mafioso acted quickly. With only 3 of us left, we need to be very careful with our vote today - one wrong move and the mafia wins."
You: "Charlie, you're right. We need to be cautious with our votes today—maybe we should all share any hunches before deciding."
Charlie: "Bob, you cut off mid-sentence. That's suspicious timing. Alice seems genuine in wanting us to share information. I think we should hear what Bob was actually going to say before voting."
Bob: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night and confirmed it."
You: "Bob, that's a ridiculous accusation! If you're the detective, prove it with more than just words—maybe you're the one hiding something."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob

players.name: Bob
